title: Backup Configuration
description: Defines the behavior of level backups.

backup_interval.description: How often a backup is made when "backup_behavior" is set to "Interval"

backup_schedule.description: Defines a backup schedule. Only some components of the dates will be used, depending on "backup_schedule_interval"

backup_schedule_is_utc.description: Interpret "backup_schedule" in UTC instead of local time.

save_backup_on_startup.description: Save a backup when the server starts up. A cooldown can be customized with "backup_on_startup_cooldown"

backup_on_startup_cooldown.description: If a backup was saved less than this long ago, a startup backup will not be made.

max_backups.description: The maximum amount of backups that can be made before older backups are deleted.

max_total_backup_size_mb.description: The maximum size in MB of all backups before older backups are deleted.

skip_inactive_backup.description: A backup will be skipped if no users have joined since the last backup.

save_backup_logs.description: Save extra logging information with the backup.

save_level_on_backup.description: Also save the world when an automatic backup runs.
